name: Chill Touch
description: Attach a skeletal hand to the target that reduces the amount gained from healing by half. This effect is overcome by the vitality effect.

name: Spare the Dying
description: Touch a creature that is at exactly 0 or -1 health, stabilizing their condition.

name: Lesser Summon Zombie
description: Summons a weak zombie. str 12 con 17 dex 3 wis 1 int 1 cha -2 apr 1 thac0 18 ac 8.

name: Summon Zombie
description: Summons a zombie. str 15 con 18 dex 4 wis 1 int 1 cha -3 apr 2 thac0 12 ac 2.

name: Greater Summon Zombie
description: Summons a zombie. str 17 con 19 dex 5 wis 1 int 1 cha -4 apr 4 thac0 6 ac 0.

name: Master Summon Zombie
description: Summons a zombie. str 20 con 20 dex 7 wis 1 int 1 cha -5 apr 10 thac0 0 ac -5.

name: Lesser Summon Skeleton
description: Summons a weak skeleton that can use weapons. str 8 con 15 dex 5 wis 2 int 3 cha -1 apr 1 thac0 17 ac 7.

name: Summon Skeleton
description: Summons a skeleton that can use weapons. str 10 con 16 dex 7 wis 2 int 3 cha -1 apr 2 thac0 11 ac 1.

name: Greater Summon Skeleton
description: Summons a skeleton that can use weapons. str 14 con 17 dex 10 wis 2 int 3 cha -1 apr 3 thac0 5 ac 0.

name: Master Summon Skeleton
description: Summons a skeleton that can use weapons. str 18 con 18 dex 15 wis 2 int 3 cha -1 apr 5 thac0 -1 ac -7.

name: Summon Small Undead Animal
description: Summons a small undead animal under your control. You may specify an animal with no dimension larger than 2ft or a random animal will be summoned. The animal may be either skeletal or fleshy.

name: Summon Undead Animal
description: Summons an undead animal under your control. You may specify an animal with no dimension larger than 4ft or a random animal will be summoned. The animal may be either skeletal or fleshy.

name: Summon Large Undead Animal
description: Summons a large undead animal under your control. You may specify any non-magical animal or a random animal will be summoned. The animal may be either skeletal or fleshy.

name: Lesser Raise Dead
description: Animate a skeleton or corpse of a creature to fight for you. This creature must be level 1. Improving this spell raises the level cap by 1.

name: Raise Dead
description: Animate a skeleton or corpse of a creature to fight for you. This creature must be level 5 or below. Improving this spell raises the level cap by 1.

name: Greater Raise Dead
description: Animate a skeleton or corpse of a creature to fight for you. This creature must be level 10 or below. Improving this spell raises the level cap by 1.

name: Master Raise Dead
description: Animate a skeleton or corpse of a creature to fight for you. This creature must be your level or below. Improving this spell raises the level cap by 1.

name: Speak with Dead
description: Speak with a skeleton or corpse who has died in the past 10 days. The dead creature only knows what they knew in life.

name: Speak with Unead
description: Speak with any undead corpse or skeleton.

name: Consume Soul
description: Consume the captured soul of another creature gaining some of its power. If the creature was above your level, there is a 5 * (their level - your level) percent chance that you become posessed.

name: Lesser Summon Vampire
description: Summons a vampire that is either a level 3 necromancer, mage, rogue, or fighter. str 12 con 13 dex 10 wis 15 int 10 cha 12 apr 3 thac0 15 ac 5. Improving this skill increases the level of the vampire by 1.

name: Summon Vampire
description: Summons a vampire that is either a level 8 necromancer, mage, rogue, or fighter. str 15 con 16 dex 13 wis 16 int 12 cha 15 apr 8 thac0 10 ac 0. Improving this skill increases the level of the vampire by 1.

name: Greater Summon Vampire
description: Summons a vampire that is either a level 12 necromancer, mage, rogue, or fighter. str 17 con 18 dex 15 wis 18 int 14 cha 17 apr 12 thac0 6 ac -4. Improving this skill increases the level of the vampire by 1.

name: Master Summon Vampire
description: Summons a vampire that is either a level 15 necromancer, mage, rogue, or fighter. str 19 con 20 dex 18 wis 20 int 14 cha 19 apr 15 thac0 3 ac -7. Improving this skill increases the level of the vampire by 1.

name: Lesser Summon Ghost
description: Summons an etherial ghost to fight for you. The ghost cannot be hurt by non-enchanted weapons and has access to level 1 mage spells. str 5 con 20 dex 5 wis 10 int 1 cha -1 apr 1 thac0 16 ac 6. Improving this spell increases the ghosts level by 1.

name: Summon Ghost
description: Summons an etherial ghost to fight for you. The ghost cannot be hurt by non-enchanted weapons and has access to level 4 mage spells. str 7 con 20 dex 7 wis 13 int 2 cha -2 apr 2 thac0 11 ac 1. Improving this spell increases the ghosts level by 1.

name: Greater Summon Ghost
description: Summons an etherial ghost to fight for you. The ghost cannot be hurt by non-enchanted weapons and has access to level 9 mage spells. str 10 con 20 dex 10 wis 16 int 3 cha -3 apr 3 thac0 5 ac -5. Improving this spell increases the ghosts level by 1.

name: Master Summon Ghost
description: Summons an etherial ghost to fight for you. The ghost cannot be hurt by non-enchanted weapons and has access to level 16 mage spells. str 15 con 20 dex 15 wis 20 int 4 cha -4 apr 4 thac0 3 ac -11. Improving this spell increases the ghosts level by 1.

name: Summon Spectre
description: Summon a spectre using the captured soul of another creature. If the creature's level is greater than yours, this spectre has a 10 * (their level - your level) percent chance of rebelling.

name: Fright
description: Trigger horror in a target with a 10% bonus. If successful, the target spends their next turn fleeing. Horror = bonus + 5 * aggressor level + 3 * negative cha - 10 * defender level.

name: Mass Fright
description: Trigger horror in all target that can sense you with a 10% bonus. If successful, the target spends their next turn fleeing. Horror = bonus + 5 * aggressor level + 3 * negative cha - 10 * defender level.
